mapper.sql: psd.id, psd.order_code, psd.client_id, psd.paid, psd.refund_flag, psd.refund_time, psd.create_time, psd.last_update, psd.delete_flag, psd.delete_time
mapper.select: SELECT , ccc.id AS coupon_code_id FROM pos_sale_detail psd LEFT JOIN card_coupon_code ccc on ccc.pos_sale_detail_id = psd.id AND ccc.belong = -1 AND ccc.use_status != 3 AND ccc.delete_flag = 0 WHERE psd.order_code = #{orderCode}
